description: In 2022, I successfully completed the Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) examination, marking a pivotal moment in my academic journey. This achievement demonstrates my commitment to learning and signifies my readiness for higher education or entry into the professional world. It lays the groundwork for future aspirations and endeavors.

In 2020, I successfully passed the Secondary School Certificate (SSC) examination, marking a significant milestone in my educational journey. This achievement reflects my dedication to academic excellence and sets the foundation for future educational pursuits and career endeavors.
